post.author: 김태희
post.content:
RPM Technologies

Category:        CO-OP
Location:        Toronto, ON
        
Java Developer; Co-Op
The role of the Java Developer; Co-op is to actively participate in projects which involve
coding and design to contribute to the success of each project in a timely fashion.
Preferably, you have experience in working with:
·  Java
·  Oracle
·  WSAD / RAD
·  Rational Rose
·  XML
·  SQL / BRIO
·  WEB UI
The successful candidate will also have:
·  Excellent communication (including writing) skills.
·  A proactive “service-first” attitude
If you are an independent self-starter who prides themselves on their quality of work,
enjoys problem solving, a multi-task with varying priorities and shift focus, maintains a
positive attitude and is looking to work in a fast paced and challenging environment, this
may be the ideal position for you!
post.title: Java Developer; Co-Op RPM Tech
